info.title: Federal Policy Analyst API
info.description: AI-powered policy analysis service that provides expert federal government policy research and recommendations. Submit policy questions and receive detailed analysis from a specialized federal policy analyst.

post.description: Submit a policy question for expert analysis. The analyst will research relevant regulations, guidance, and best practices to provide a comprehensive response. Use this for questions about federal regulations, compliance, agency procedures, or government policy.

get.description: Returns the current health status of the Federal Policy Analyst API.

query.description: The policy question or topic to analyze. Be specific about the agency, regulation, or policy area.

context.description: Additional context such as the agency involved, specific situation, or relevant background information.

requestor.description: Name or role of the person requesting the analysis.

requestId.description: Unique identifier for this analysis request

status.description: Status of the analysis (completed, error, timeout)

result.description: The detailed policy analysis and recommendations
